# DDDevice.MediaPlaybackState.paused

**Case**

A state that indicates when content playback for the device pauses.

## Declaration

```swift
case paused
```

## Distinguishing media playback states

- **DDDevice.MediaPlaybackState.noContent**: A state that indicates when the device plays no content.
- **DDDevice.MediaPlaybackState.playing**: A state that indicates when the device plays media.

items.description: A state that indicates when the device plays no content.

items.description: A state that indicates when the device plays media.
